dict.acceptation: 批准；认可；核准；为…提供证据；
赞同；称许；称赞；满意、喜欢(of)；

sent.orig: To enact, amend or repeal laws, examine and approve budgets, approve taxation and public expenditure etc.
sent.trans: 制定、修改和废除法律，审核、通过财政预算，批准税收和公共开支等。

sent.orig: Congress would have to approve any fee plan.
sent.trans: 国会可能不得不通过任何征收费用的计划。

sent.orig: This their way is their folly: yet their posterity approve their sayings. Selah.
sent.trans: 13他们行的这道，本为自己的愚昧。但他们以后的人，还佩服他们的话语。（细拉）。

sent.orig: As appropriate, review and approve staff performance reports.
sent.trans: 适当的评审及批准成员行为报告。

sent.orig: The bank letter of credIt'should approve of through us opens. 10.
sent.trans: 该信用证应通过我们认可的银行开出。
